review: I had visited the hospital with my mother and it was related to my mother's health  . Doctor was good and well experienced. we  are   fully satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. There was no   long  waiting time in the hospital. Overall it was very good. I would like to recommend the doctor in future for my  family and friends too.

Today....I went to hospital with my mother **** *** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** 
He calmly listen her problem and gave her **** solution of her problem......it was awesome experience...

There was no such long line .

He prescribed medicine of worth RS 18000, yes eighteen thousand for a month... 
Who can afford that ??
No plan to follow up with him.
As long as his medical explaination of health issue and way of talking is considered... It was nice.

** ** **** * ***** ***** ** ******** ********* **** ******* ** **** ******* *** ***** ** **** * *** **** *** **** ***** ******* **** ******** ** *** **** ******** *** ******** he suggests 20k a month medicine. We have visited there with 3 people with different pain issue *** ** ********** **** ******** ** *** *** * ***** *** medicine cost was 20k per person...how a middle class family will afford that.

review: Never expect this from such a reputative doc as he is so rude and shouted us without listening us problem as doc are here for give us statisfaction and calmness as we come to them havin so much trust like we do on god but this type of behaviour and super expenses medicine *** *** **** *** we didnt expect this thanks
